items.summary: Update the audio UploadSection drag-and-drop area so the entire dropzone is fully clickable/tappable on both mobile and desktop to open the file picker (not only the "Select File" button). Ensure the click/tap triggers the underlying <input type="file"> reliably on mobile Chrome.

Improve the upload dropzone hit-area and accessibility: show a clear pointer/interactive affordance when enabled, and support keyboard activation (Enter/Space) for the dropzone to open the file picker.
